item.title: Three Rules to Excel at Work
item.description: My day at work had just began, when I overheard a colleague of mine talking about rule number two. He is very senior to me and is dangerously intelligent! I couldn't stop myself from asking him what the rule number two was. “Hey, what is rule number two?", I asked. “Well, do you know rule number one?", he questioned. I replied, “Nope”, thinking why didn't I ask about rule number one first!
